net.krotscheck.util

Class ResourceUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.krotscheck.util.ResourceUtil

  • public final class ResourceUtil
extends Object
    A utility class that simplifies reading resource files.
    Author:
    Michael Krotscheck

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static File getFileForResource(String resourcePath)
      Convert a resource path to a File object.

      Convert a resource path to an absolute file path.

    • Method Detail

      • getPathForResource

        public static String getPathForResource(String resourcePath)
        Convert a resource path to an absolute file path.
        Parameters:
        resourcePath - The resource-relative path to resolve.
        Returns:
        The absolute path to this resource.

      • getFileForResource

        public static File getFileForResource(String resourcePath)
        Convert a resource path to a File object.
        Parameters:
        resourcePath - The resource-relative path to resolve.
        Returns:
        A file instance representing the resource in question.

      • getResourceAsString

        public static String getResourceAsString(String resourcePath)
        Read the resource found at a specific path into a string.
        Parameters:
        resourcePath - The path to the resource.
        Returns:
        The resource as a string, or an empty string if the resource was not found.

      • getResourceAsStream

        public static InputStream getResourceAsStream(String resourcePath)
        Read the resource found at the given path into a stream.
        Parameters:
        resourcePath - The path to the resource.
        Returns:
        The resource as an input stream. If the resource was not found, this will be the NullInputStream.
